text: ` ` Jersey Shore.'' Frazer Harrison / Getty Images MTV's successful reality TV show ` ` Jersey Shore'' is returning for a multi - episode reboot called ` ` Jersey Shore Family Vacation.'' MTV announced the return of the show on Monday. ` ` Jersey Shore,'' which ran from 2009 to 2012, had an average of 9 million viewers per episode at its peak in 2011, according to The Hollywood Reporter. Most of the show's original cast is reportedly returning, including Paul ` ` Pauly D'' DelVecchio, Jenni ` ` JWoww'' Farley, Vinny Guadagnino, Ronnie Ortiz - Magro, Nicole ` ` Snooki'' Polizzi, Mike ` ` The Situation '
